other_tests.findings: Tumor was a hard, yellowish mass that was entirely extradural and densely adherent to the dural surface.
Demonstrated fragments of fibrous tissue infiltrated by large numbers of foamy histiocytes with cholesterol clefts, surrounded by multinucleated giant cells.
The mass on the left side had minimally increased in size (~0.5 cm) and the lesion remnants on the right side remained unchanged.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The mass on the left side increased in size, while the right side remained unchanged.
